name: Plum Glaze for Baked Ham
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon fresh thyme leaves, or 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
1 tablespoon cider vinegar, or red or white wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan with a lid, melt butter over medium heat until it foams. Add shallots, thyme and pinch of salt. Cook, stirring, until shallots are soft and fragrant but not brown, 3 minutes. Add stock and plums; bring to boil. Turn off heat, cover, and let stand 10 minutes to plums soften.
Pour into a food processor, add mustard and vinegar, and process until smooth.
